column2: You can go on a once in a lifetime hunt with some of your court.
You can host a magnificent feast and invite the Realm.
You can hire a random realm Diplomat to work in your court.
You can hire a random realm Soldier to work in your court.
You can hire a random realm Steward to work in your court.
You can hire a random realm Spy to work in your court.
You can hire a random realm Learnedman to work in your court.
You can hire a random realm Woman to work in your court.
You can hire a random realm Medicus to work in your court.
You are a King without an Elite Guard.
You are lacking one of the Will and can elevate one of the realm Houses.
Your Guard Corps is lacking so you can name one of the Realm.
One of the Guards is errant.
Your Liege has too many Guard Corps.
You are suffering from an unknown illness and can consult a Medicus.
There is a swordsmith in the region, so you can purchase a sword.
There is a swordsmith in the region, so you can purchase a sword for [Root.GetFirstName].
There is a swordsmith in the region, so you can purchase a set of armor.
There is a swordsmith in the region, so you can purchase a set of armor for [Root.GetFirstName].
You have a beon pup that you can give to [Root.GetFirstName].
You have a kunun pup that you can give to [Root.GetFirstName].
You have a pleen cub that you can give to [Root.GetFirstName].
You have a tochon kitten that you can give to [Root.GetFirstName].
You have a tusklet that you can give to [Root.GetFirstName].
